scripts.deploy:supersim: pnpm build:contracts && sup deploy create2 --chains supersiml2a,supersiml2b --salt ethers phoenix --forge-artifact-path contracts/out/CrossChainCounter.sol/CrossChainCounter.json --network supersim --private-key 0x5de4111afa1a4b94908f83103eb1f1706367c2e68ca870fc3fb9a804cdab365a
scripts.deploy:counter-incrementer:supersim: pnpm build:contracts && sup deploy create2 --chains supersiml2a,supersiml2b --salt ethers phoenix --forge-artifact-path contracts/out/CrossChainCounterIncrementer.sol/CrossChainCounterIncrementer.json --network supersim --private-key 0x5de4111afa1a4b94908f83103eb1f1706367c2e68ca870fc3fb9a804cdab365a
scripts.deploy:interop-alpha: pnpm build:contracts && sup deploy create2 --chains interop-alpha-0,interop-alpha-1 --salt ethers phoenix --forge-artifact-path contracts/out/CrossChainCounter.sol/CrossChainCounter.json --network interop-alpha --verify
